resources.string: "Set the bird\'s wings with gold and it will never again soar in the sky."- Rabindranath Tagore.
"I like the sky. You can look at it forever and never get tired of it, and when you don't want to look at it anymore, you stop."- Haruki Murakami.
"There is one spectacle grander than the sea, that is the sky; there is one spectacle grander than the sky, that is the interior of the soul."- Victor Hugo.
"The sky is filled with stars, invisible by day."- Henry Wadsworth Longfellow.
"Clouds come floating into my life, no longer to carry rain or usher storm, but to add color to my sunset sky."- Rabindranath Tagore.
"I am inspired by anything beautiful. Sometime it's a pair of eyes or flowing gorgeous hair, other times it's the sky or a sunset."- Nadine Velazquez.
"Rest is not idleness... watching the clouds float across the sky, is by no means a waste of time."- John Lubbock.
"You'll never find a rainbow if you're looking down." — Charlie Chaplin
"Try to be a rainbow in someone's cloud." — Maya Angelou
"There's always been a rainbow hanging over your head." — Kacey Musgraves
“Somewhere over the rainbow, skies are blue, and the dreams that you dare to dream really do come true.” — E.Y. Young
"And still, after all this time,The sun never says to the earth,'You owe Me.' Look what happens with A love like that,It lights the Whole Sky."- Hafiz.
"If you surround yourself with positive people who build you up, the sky is the limit."- Joel Brown.
"Don't tell me the sky's the limit when there are footprints on the moon."- Paul Brandt.
"The number of ways you can live in one lifetime is limitless. So why limit yourself? The sky is not the limit. Beyond the universe is."- Suzy Kassem.
A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
"Summertime is always the best of what might be." — Charles Bowden.
"Keep your face to the sun and you will never see the shadows." — Helen Keller.
“If there is magic on this planet, it is contained in water.”
"Water is the driving force of all nature."
"Nothing is softer or more flexible than water, yet nothing can resist it.”
"The sky takes on shades of orange during sunrise and sunset, the colour that gives you hope that the sun will set only to rise again."- Ram Charan.
"Only from the heart can you touch the sky."- Rumi.
"When the sun rises, it rises for everyone."
"He was pointing at the moon, but I was looking at his hand."- Richard Siken.
“Thousands have lived without love, not one without water.”
Change will not come if we wait for some other person or some other time.
“We forget that the water cycle and the life cycle are one.”
“Only from the heart can you touch the sky.”
See more or less image quotes.
